references: Related: CF 272259, Ord 97498, Ord 98859, Ord 99736, Ord 97059
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and making an appropriation in addition to those authorized by Ordinances 97498, 98859 and Ordinance 99736 from the Park Acquisition and Development Fund for necessary salary and administrative expenses in connection with public park and recreation facilities Resolution 34571 and Ordinance 97059.
